description:
Learn Piano with Rosa - Rosa's Piano Online School - Teaching 32 Courses!

OVER 10,000 Successful students have already taken my piano online courses since July 2014 with 231 - 5 Star Reviews

Course Updated: November 15, 2015

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Read Music Notes Fast Level 2 - A Comprehensive 7 Day Program to help Beginners to Read 22 Music Notes Accurately! 112 Lectures with 3 Hours Content!


This 7 Day Program will help students master reading 11 musical notes in the Treble Clef and 11 musical notes in the Bass Clef.

This is a PROGRAM to apply my Music Note Attack Method ( 6 Steps laid out in Level 1)

11 Treble Clef Notes: Middle C, D, E, F, G, A , B, C, D, E

11 Bass Clef: G, A, B, C, D, E, F, G, A, B, Middle C

**********************************************************************

Rosa will walk you through her Unique Method in this course: Music Note Attack Approach to all 22 Music Notes in 7 Days!

For sure, when you finish this course in 7 days, you will know these music notes inside out. She has a TEST Section for each day to monitor your own progress!

This is a UNIQUE Method that I develop for BEGINNERS who wants to learn how to read notes and to read them QUICKLY!

  • We are dealing specifically in the area of reading the music notes on music staff in both the Treble Clef and Bass Clef.
  • We are NOT dealing with reading other music symbols, rhythm, or value and duration of notes.

We want to quickly help BEGINNERS to master the Music Language of A-B-C-D-E-F-G so that they can quickly identify the notes on the music staff like they call out the names of their friends.

You will learn 22 Music Notes in the Grand Staff and name each one of them accurately like you would call your friends' names.

**********************************************

Rosa's Note Attack Method & Say It Loud:

1. Intuitive Visual Recognition

2. Visual Memory in the Brain

3. Say it out Loud to store in Brain

4. Practice Smart - Exercises

************************************************

Learn to think in GROUPS & PATTERNS with some extra Music Hot Tips from me. Music Students are frustrated when they want to learn to read music because they are "Not Focused". It is not their fault. They do not know "how" and "where" to focus! In this program, I help you to think in Groups and in Patterns so that you can learn easily! When you have fun in your learning, you find that everything is easy, not because music has changed, but it is because the 'approach' of learning has changed as you enroll into this 7 Day program.

This 7 Day Program is designed for you to mast this skill of learning ALL 22 Music Notes in 7 Days. Only learn what you need to learn for that "one day" so that your brain can absorb the information and retain it in your memory bank. Then the next day, you learn 2 or 5 more music notes. Do not try to gulp at all 22 notes on one day unless you are an advanced student. This program is for 'beginners' who want to master 'music note reading' quickly!

This course can also be used by Music Teachers or Parents who want to teach their children to 'Read Music Fast'. You can use these videos to guide your children in this Music Note Attack Method. Children learn very quickly in this 7 Day Program. For younger children, you may want to stretch it to 7 WEEKS instead of 7 Days. Even 7 weeks is a very good accomplishment! :) Have fun!

Day 1: Three Music Notes in Treble Clef: E, B, F

Smart Practice & Exercises in 3 Treble Clef Notes: E, B, F

Day 1 Test!

Day 2: Two Music Notes in Treble Clef: G, D

Smart Practice & Exercises in 5 Treble Clef Notes: C, E, G, B, D, F

Day 2 Test!

Day 3: Five Music Notes in Treble Clef: D, F, A, C, E

Smart Practice & Exercises in 4 Treble Clef Notes: D, F, A, C, E

Day 3 Test!

Day 4: Three Music Notes in Bass Clef: G, D, A

Smart Practice & Exercises in 3 Bass Clef: G, D, A

Day 4 Test!

Day 5: Two Music Notes in Bass Clef: F, B

Smart Practice & Exercises in 5 Bass Clef Notes: G, B, D, F, A

Day 5 Test!

Day 6: Five Music Notes in Bass Clef: A, C, E, G, B

Smart Practice & Exercises in 5 Bass Clef Notes: A, C, E, G, B

Day 6 Test!

Day 7: Exam Time on the 22 Music Notes!

Exam 1: Treble Clef Whole Notes: C, D, E, F, G, A, B, C, D, E, F

Exam 2: Treble Clef Half Notes: C, D, E, F, G, A, B, C, D, E, F

Exam 3: Treble Clef Quarter Notes: C, D, E, F, G, A, B, C, D, E, F

Exam 4: Treble Clef Mixture of Notes: C, D, E, F, G, A, B, C, D, E, F

Exam 5: Bass Clef Whole Notes: G, A, B, C, D, E, F, G, A, B, C

Exam 6: Bass Clef Half Notes: G, A, B, C, D, E, F, G, A, B, C

Exam 7: Bass Clef Quarter Notes: G, A, B, C, D, E, F, G, A, B, C

Exam 8: Bass Clef Mixture of Notes: G, A, B, C, D, E, F, G, A, B, C

BONUS Section: Fun & Games!

**************************************

This Level 2 is part of a "Read Music Fast" Series.

1. Read Music Fast Level 1 - The Note Attack Method - 6 Steps

2. Read Music Fast Level 2 - Read 22 Music Notes with Accuracy in 7 DAYS

(Using the Note Attack Method)

3. Read Music Fast Level 3 - Read 22 Music Notes with Speed

(Using the Note Attack Method)


***************************************************************************

title: Read Music Notes Fast #2: Read 22 Music Notes in 7 Days
